text: The 2001 New Mexico State Aggies football team represented New Mexico State University in the 2001 NCAA Division I-A football season. The Aggies were coached by head coach Tony Samuel and played their home games at Aggie Memorial Stadium in Las Cruces, New Mexico. They participated as members of the Sun Belt Conference. ==Schedule== https://web.archive.org/web/20021017212611/http://nmstatesports.ocsn.com/sports/m-footbl/nmst- m-footbl- sched.htmlhttps://web.archive.org/web/20030402093657/http://nmstatesports.ocsn.com/sports/m-footbl/nmst- m-footbl-sched.html ==Roster== ==References== New Mexico State Category:New Mexico State Aggies football seasons Category:2001 in sports in New Mexico
